Mattis has helped transform the Pentagon over the last two years, prioritizing the personnel, training, readiness & modernization of our Armed Forces. America is safer and more secure because of his tremendous leadership, and I am grateful for his service to our nation.
Jim Mattis is the definition of an American Patriot. From his enlistment in the Marine Corps to his service as Secretary of Defense, he has always served our nation with honor and integrity.
As a member of the Armed Services Committee, I will be asking administration officials for details about the plan, including how it aligns with America’s national security strategy. (3/3)

We cannot afford to repeat the mistake of the Obama Admin’s decision to prematurely withdraw from Iraq, which led to the rise of ISIS. I have concerns that withdrawal from Syria at the current time could lead to the resurgence of ISIS and provide a boost to Russia and Iran. (2/3)
While I support the President’s goal of removing American troops from harm’s way, we need to make sure the withdrawal of America’s presence from Syria is done the right way, at the right time. (1/3)

#HappyHanukkah⁠ ⁠to all who are celebrating and a safe holiday season to you and your family!
Susan and I send our condolences to the Bush family and join the rest of the nation in honoring a great American. (3/3)

He always made the tough decisions and put the nation’s interests first. A true testament to his character was his ability to befriend his old political rivals, a reminder that despite our differences, more unites the American people, including its leaders, than divides us. (2/3)

George H.W. Bush will be long remembered for dedicating his life to protecting & bettering the country he loved, from his heroic service as a Navy pilot during WWII, to his steady leadership as President, playing a pivotal role to end the Cold War.  (1/3)
